hero.description: At 18 years old and being a native of Buenos Aires, Argentina, I define myself as a passionate junior programmer, always in constant search for opportunities to learn and grow in the world of programming.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: My primary stack
about.detail: Additional technologies that are part of my experience

items.title: What kind of work do I do?
items.description: I am a passionate web developer on the path to becoming full stack. I enjoy tackling all aspects of development, from design to backend and frontend. My comprehensive approach allows me to create complete web experiences, and I am constantly seeking new challenges to expand my skills.

items.title: What am I passionate about, and what do I value?
items.description: My passion is creating engaging and functional websites that add value to the user. I recognize and appreciate the effort invested by each team member in achieving a job well done.

items.title: What kind of work culture am I looking for?
items.description: I am looking for a place where I can grow professionally and enhance my programming and design skills. I would love to work in a team where mutual support is provided to achieve the best possible result in a given task.

items.title: What am I currently doing?
items.description: Currently, I work as a freelance developer, taking on projects that allow me to improve my skills while seeking new job opportunities.

items.title: My education and academic certifications
items.description: I hold a Web Developer and JavaScript Certificate from CoderHouse, as well as another certificate in LUA obtained through Udemy. Additionally, I have academic experience as a former student of Systems Development at the Universidad Argentina de la Empresa (UADE). Although I do not have formal certifications in other languages at the moment, I have acquired substantial skills in various technologies throughout my educational journey.

featured.title: ShingCC - Shop
featured.description: This is a test project of my brand ShingCC that has a clothing store and photos.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: At the moment, I am actively seeking new job opportunities. Feel free to contact me anytime; I will be keeping an eye out for your response.
